alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Currituck; Gates; Hertford; Northampton; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 07 at 6:27PM EDT until April 07 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 104 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA BERTIE CAMDEN CHOWAN CURRITUCK GATES HERTFORD NORTHAMPTON PASQUOTANK PERQUIMANS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 COUNTIES IN EASTERN VIRGINIA MATHEWS MIDDLESEX NORTHAMPTON IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA ACCOMACK CITY OF CHESAPEAKE CITY OF FRANKLIN CITY OF HAMPTON CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS CITY OF NORFOLK CITY OF POQUOSON CITY OF PORTSMOUTH CITY OF SUFFOLK CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH GLOUCESTER ISLE OF WIGHT SOUTHAMPTON YORK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AHOSKIE, BAVON, BOWERS HILL, BOYKINS, BRYANTOWN, CAPE CHARLES, CAPE COLONY, CHESAPEAKE AIRPORT, CHINCOTEAGUE, COURTLAND, CURRITUCK, DEEP CREEK, EAGLETOWN, EDENHOUSE, EDENTON, ELIZABETH CITY, EXMORE, FENTRESS, FRANKLIN, GARYSBURG, GASTON, GATESVILLE, GLOUCESTER POINT, GREAT BRIDGE, GREENBACKVILLE, GREENBRIER, GUM FORKS, HAMPTON, HANCOCK, HERTFORD, HORNTOWN, HORSESHOE, HUNTERDALE, IVOR, LILLY, MACEDONIA, MAVATON, MERRY HILL, MIDWAY, MOUNT PLEASANT, NEW CHURCH, NEW POINT, NEW POINT COMFORT, NEWPORT NEWS, NORFOLK, ONANCOCK, PEARY, POQUOSON, PORTSMOUTH, QUITSNA, RICH SQUARE, SAINT JOHNS, SHARON, SMITHFIELD, SUFFOLK, URBANNA, VALHALLA, VIRGINIA BEACH, VULTARE, WINDSOR, AND YORKTOWN.
